sourcesContent:
import './btnStyle.css' import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' const Style = ({style} ) => { const [active ,setActive ] = useState(localStorage.getItem('style')) useEffect(()=>{ setActive( localStorage.getItem('style')) },[]) useEffect(()=>{ if(active === undefined){ changeStyle(active) console.log('carregou') } },[]) function changeStyle(value){ setActive(value) localStorage.setItem('style', value) console.log('klsdkfldk') document.querySelector(`#root`).classList.remove('dark') document.querySelector(`#root`).classList.remove('light') document.querySelector(`#root`).classList.add(value) } return (
{changeStyle('light')}} className={`light-box ${active === "light" ? 'style-selected':''}`}>
{changeStyle('dark')}} className={`dark-box ${active === "dark" ? 'style-selected':''}`}>
) } export default Style
